page.title: 15 POPULATION OF KENNINGTON
page.content: In Kennington, the approximate number of dwellings today in 1985 is four thousand. The average amount of people in a house in{KENNINGTON}is two point four-sevenths. Taking both figures into consideration, the population of the {KENNINGTON}area is 9,880. In the{ {KENNINGTON} area one half ofthe population are adults, one third are children and one and one sixth are old age pensioners (people over 60 or 65). A large proportion of working adults commute to other areas for work. (An adult is considered to be an adult when he or she is over the age of eighteen). The majority of houses are lived in by relatively young couples with young children.
